message: a delicious/pinboard.in/etc style inline link that appears nearby the mark-as-read button would be preferable IMO.
Kind of annoying to have to mouse over to a JS modal popup window to confirm a mark-as-read action :(
*searched for 'popup' and found no other feedback topics...but this is probably a dupe anyway*
I guess whacking Enter (which at least on my setup does hit the popup's OK button) is a reasonable alternative for the time being...
A tasty little confirmation tool-tippy popover could do the job, too.
